name: Black Nate Saves the World
description:
Download for Windows or Mac to play the newest update.

This is a prototype version of Black Nate Saves the World. In this build, you can play through three levels, and you can play as eight characters. Black Nate, Jake Olives, Tommy Crayon, Aids Lion, Overy Parkinsins, Eder Out Perez, and "Dark Skinned" Danny. Please keep in mind that this game is very far from complete.

*Health system is broken as of now. Trying to fix it*

-Controls-

Movement - WASD

Jump - SPACEBAR

Shoot - LEFT CLICK

Pause/Unpause - P

Switch Weapon - SCROLL
